p: SCT thus presents a unique opportunity to change the conversation about ART with young people. By specifically acknowledging adherence challenges in childhood and adolescence, if framed thoughtfully, healthcare staff can use SCT to show a greater contextual understanding about the reasons why and ways in which treatment can get disrupted. SCT could be used as a ‘reward’ for those who can manage to adhere well, sustaining them on the days ‘on’ ART and/or an incentive for others to put more effort into taking treatment and lowering viral load.
